parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the job. Valid values:

*   Running: The job is running.
*   Defragmenting: The job is defragmenting data.
*   PartialSuccess: The job is partially completed.
*   Success: The job is completed.
*   Fail: The job failed.
*   Cancelled: The job is canceled.
*   All: all.Default value:All.
